Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of Athletic Marketing and Promotions College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: Provides marketing for all athletic teams, enhances the game day experience, and manages the entire ticketing process. Enhance our overall athletic image and assist in boosting game...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
